citations.narrative:
The pellet food for the camels is being stored inside a large plastic barrel. The inner rim of the barrel has areas of
powdery green and white mold-like material growing on the surface.
Inadequate food storage can lead to contamination of food by mold and impact the quality of the feed. Supplies of food
and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, molding, or
contamination by vermin.
To be corrected by June 9, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The pellet food for the camels is being stored inside a large plastic barrel. The inner rim of the barrel has areas of 
powdery green and white mold-like material growing on the surface. 
 
Inadequate food storage can lead to contamination of food by mold and impact the quality of the feed. Supplies of food 
and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, molding, or 
contamination by vermin.  
 
To be corrected by June 9, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
